attack.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
attack.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: The Power of Cuteness
skill.desc: Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to {1} of March 7th's DEF plus {4} for {2} turn(s).\nIf the ally's current HP percentage is {3} or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

ultimate.name: Glacial Cascade
ultimate.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a {2} base chance to be Frozen for {3} turn(s).\nWhile Frozen, enemies cannot take action and will receive Additional Ice DMG equal to {4} of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

talent.name: Girl Power
talent.desc: After a Shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to {1} of her ATK. This effect can be triggered {2} time(s) each turn.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Freezing Beauty
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to Freeze a random enemy for {2} turn(s).\nWhile Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take <u>Additional</u> Ice DMG equal to {3} of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

attack.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
attack.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Cloudlancer Art: Torrent
skill.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy.\nOn a CRIT Hit, there is a {4} base chance to reduce the target's SPD by {2} for {3} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Ethereal Dream
ultimate.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, the Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by {2}.

talent.name: Superiority of Reach
talent.desc: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's Ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by {1}. This effect can be triggered again after {2} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Splitting Spearhead
technique.desc: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by {1} at the start of the next battle for {2} turn(s).

attack.name: Sawblade Tuning
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Molten Detonation
skill.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to {2} of Himeko's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

ultimate.name: Heavenly Flare
ultimate.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates {2} extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

talent.name: Victory Rush
talent.desc: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max {2} points).\nIf Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.\nAt the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Incomplete Combustion
technique.desc: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for {4} second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by {2} for {3} turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

attack.name: Gravity Suppression
attack.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Edge of the Void
skill.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a {2} base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by {3} for {4} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Synthetic Black Hole
ultimate.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a {3} base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by {2} and SPD reduced by {4}.

talent.name: Time Distortion
talent.desc: When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of his ATK to the enemy.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
technique.desc: After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for {4} second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by {5}. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their <u>actions delayed</u> by {2} and SPD reduced by {3}. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

attack.name: System Warning
attack.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Allow Changes?
skill.desc: There is a {2} base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field ally's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by {4} for {3} turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered. Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept. In addition, there is a {5} base chance to reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy further by {6} for {7} turn(s). Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.

ultimate.name: User Banned
ultimate.desc: There's a {2} base chance to decrease the target enemy's DEF by {3} for {4} turn(s). And at the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to the target enemy.

talent.name: Awaiting System Response...
talent.desc: Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: reduce ATK by {1}, reduce DEF by {2}, and reduce SPD by {3}.\nEvery time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a {4} base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for {5} turn(s) in the enemy target.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Force Quit Program
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Silver Wolf's ATK to all enemies, and ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.

attack.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Shackle Breaker
skill.desc: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to {1} of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to {2} of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

ultimate.name: Frenzied Punishment
ultimate.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to {2} of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Pain and Anger
talent.desc: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of {1} more DMG.

mazeattack.name: Attack

technique.name: Swift Harvest
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

ultimate.name: Astral Blessing
ultimate.desc: Increases SPD of all allies by {1} for {2} turn(s).

talent.name: Astrometry
talent.desc: Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness.\nFor every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by {1}, up to {2} time(s).\nStarting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by {3} at the beginning of every turn.

skill.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Herta's ATK to all enemies. If the enemy's HP percentage is {2} or higher, DMG dealt to this target increases by {3}.

ultimate.name: It's Magic, I Added Some Magic
ultimate.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

talent.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
talent.desc: When an ally's attack causes an enemy's HP percentage to fall to {1} or lower, Herta will launch a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to {2} of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

skill.desc: Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by {1} for {3} turn(s).\nWhen this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

ultimate.desc: Increases the ATK of all allies by {1}, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to {2} of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus {3} for {4} turn(s).

talent.desc: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by {1}.

While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by {1} for {2} turn(s).\nEnemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

technique.desc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for {1} second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

ultimate.name: Enduring Bulwark

technique.desc: After Gepard uses his Technique, when the next battle begins, a Shield will be applied to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to {1} of Gepard's DEF plus {3} for {2} turn(s).

attack.name: Behind the Kindness
attack.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Love, Heal, and Choose
skill.desc: Restores a single ally for {1} of Natasha's Max HP plus {4}. Restores the ally for another {2} of Natasha's Max HP plus {5} at the beginning of each turn for {3} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Gift of Rebirth
ultimate.desc: Heals all allies for {1} of Natasha's Max HP plus {2}.

talent.name: Innervation
talent.desc: When healing allies with HP percentage at {1} or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by {2}. This effect also works on continuous healing.

mazeattack.name: Attack

skill.desc: Removes {2} buff(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Pela's ATK to a single target enemy.

talent.name: Data Collecting
talent.desc: If the enemy is debuffed after Pela's attack, Pela will restore {1} additional Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.

mazeattack.name: Attack

technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Pela deals Ice DMG equal to {4} of her ATK to a random enemy, with a {1} <u>base chance</u> of lowering the DEF of all enemies by {2} for {3} turn(s).

attack.name: I Want to Help
attack.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

ultimate.name: Promise, Not Command
ultimate.desc: After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra {4}, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for {3} turn(s).\nIn addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by {2}. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect {5} time(s).

talent.name: Because We're Family
talent.desc: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by {3}. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to {2} of Clara's ATK.

mazeattack.name: Attack

technique.name: A Small Price for Victory

attack.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {2} of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy, and further deals DMG for {1} extra time(s), with each time dealing Wind DMG equal to {2} of Sampo's ATK to a random enemy.

ultimate.name: Surprise Present
ultimate.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1} of Sampo's ATK to all enemies, with a {4} base chance to increase the targets' DoT taken by {2} for {3} turn(s).

talent.name: Windtorn Dagger
talent.desc: Sampo's attacks have a {1} base chance to inflict Wind Shear for {3} turn(s).\nEnemies inflicted with Wind Shear will take Wind DoT equal to {2} of Sampo's ATK at the beginning of each turn. Wind Shear can stack up to {4} time(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack

technique.name: Shining Bright
technique.desc: After Sampo uses his Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Blind for {1} second(s). Blinded enemies cannot detect your team.\nWhen initiating combat against a Blinded enemy, there is a {2} <u>fixed chance</u> to delay all enemies' action by {3}.

attack.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a {2} base chance to inflict Burn for {3} turn(s).\nWhen afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to {4} of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

ultimate.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
ultimate.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.\nAfter using Ultimate, the next Skill to be used is Enhanced, which deals DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
talent.desc: When attacking a target afflicted with Burn, deals Additional Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK and regenerates {2} extra Energy.

In addition, there is a {1} <u>base chance</u> to inflict Burn on every enemy for {3} turn(s).\nWhen afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to {2} of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

undefined.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
undefined.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of Hook's ATK to a single enemy, with a {2} base chance to Burn them for {3} turn(s). Additionally, deals Fire DMG equal to {5} of Hook's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.\nWhen afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to {4} of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

attack.name: Flower Pick

skill.name: A Scoop of Moon
skill.desc: Immediately draws {1} jade tile(s) and increases DMG by {2} until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to {3} time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

ultimate.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
ultimate.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to {1} of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtains 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

talent.name: Celestial Jade
talent.desc: When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.\nIf Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.\nWhile in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by {1}, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

ultimate.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds

Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.\nWhen any ally's HP percentage drops to {3} or lower, an effect equivalent to Luocha's Skill will immediately be triggered and applied to this ally for one time (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered again after {4} turn(s).

ultimate.name: Death Wish
ultimate.desc: Removes {2} buff(s) from all enemies and deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Luocha's ATK to all enemies. Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

talent.desc: When Abyss Flower reaches {1} stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks of Abyss Flower to deploy a Field against the enemy.\nWhen any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is immediately restored by an amount equal to {2} of Luocha's ATK plus {4}.\nThe Field's effect lasts for {3} turns. When Luocha is knocked down, the Field will be dispelled.

ultimate.name: Lightbringer
ultimate.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by {2} for the next turn.

talent.name: Prana Extirpated
talent.desc: Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has {1} base SPD and {4} base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to {2} of Jing Yuan's ATK to a random single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to {5} of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of {6}. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by {3}. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values. When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear. When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

mazeattack.desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Spirit Invocation
technique.desc: After the Technique is used, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by {1} at the start of the next battle.

attack.name: Cloudfencer Art: Starshine

skill.name: Cloudfencer Art: Mountainfall
skill.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a {3} chance to trigger Sword Stance on the final hit, dealing Additional Physical DMG equal to {2} of Sushang's ATK to the enemy.\nIf the enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Sword Stance is guaranteed to trigger.

ultimate.name: Shape of Taixu: Dawn Herald
ultimate.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy target, and she immediately takes action again. In addition, Sushang's ATK increases by {4} and using her Skill has 2 extra chances to trigger Sword Stance for {2} turn(s).\nSword Stance triggered from the extra chances deals {3} of the original DMG.

talent.name: Dancing Blade
talent.desc: When an enemy has their Weakness Broken on the field, Sushang's SPD increases by {1} for {2} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Cloudfencer Art: Warcry
technique.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Sushang deals Physical DMG equal to {1} of her ATK to all enemies.

attack.name: Arrowslinger
attack.desc: Deals {1} of Yukong's ATK as Imaginary DMG to a target enemy.

skill.name: Emboldening Salvo
skill.desc: Obtains {1} stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" (to a maximum of 2 stacks). When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, the ATK of all allies increases by {2}, and every time an ally's turn ends, Yukong loses 1 stack of "Roaring Bowstrings."\nWhen it's the turn where Yukong gains "Roaring Bowstrings" by using Skill, "Roaring Bowstrings" will not be removed.

ultimate.name: Diving Kestrel
ultimate.desc: If "Roaring Bowstrings" is active on Yukong when her Ultimate is used, additionally increases all allies' CRIT Rate by {2} and CRIT DMG by {3}. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Seven Layers, One Arrow
talent.desc: Basic ATK additionally deals Imaginary DMG equal to {1} of Yukong's ATK, and increases the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this attack by {2}. This effect can be triggered again in {3} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: After attacking an enemy and entering battle, the enemy's corresponding Type Toughness will be Weakened.

technique.name: Chasing the Wind
technique.desc: After using her Technique, Yukong enters Sprint mode for {1} seconds. In Sprint mode, her Movement SPD increases by {2}, and Yukong gains {3} stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" when she enters battle by attacking enemies.

attack.name: Frost Thorn
attack.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Darting Ironthorn
skill.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to {1} of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

ultimate.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
ultimate.desc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by {1}. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra {2}. This buff lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to {3} of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: One With the Sword
talent.desc: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by {1} and his CRIT DMG increases by {2}. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a {3} fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to {4} of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a {6} base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn.\nThe Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to {5} of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn.\nWhen Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: The One True Sword
technique.desc: After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals {2} more DMG for {3} turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is {1} or higher.

attack.name: Diagnostic Kick
attack.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to {1} of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Singing Among Clouds
skill.desc: Heals a single ally for {1} of Bailu's Max HP plus {2}. Bailu then heals random allies {4} time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by {3}.

ultimate.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
ultimate.desc: Heals all allies for {1} of Bailu's Max HP plus {2}.\nBailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn.\nThe effect of Invigoration can last for {3} turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

talent.name: Gourdful of Elixir
talent.desc: After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for {1} of Bailu's Max HP plus {2}. This effect can trigger {5} time(s).\nWhen an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for {3} of Bailu's Max HP plus {4} HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Saunter in the Rain
technique.desc: After Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for {1} turn(s).

attack.name: Ice-Breaking Light
attack.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and gains 1 stack of Magma Will.

skill.name: Ever-Burning Amber
skill.desc: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by {1} and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a {2} base chance to Taunt all enemies for {3} turn(s).

ultimate.name: War-Flaming Lance
ultimate.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's ATK plus {2} of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.

talent.name: Treasure of the Architects
talent.desc: Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of {3} stack(s).\nWhen Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.\nWhen the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's DEF plus {4}. The Shield lasts for {2} turn(s).

mazeattack.name: Attack
mazeattack.desc: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

technique.name: Call of the Guardian
technique.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, gains a Shield that absorbs DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's DEF plus {2} for {3} turn(s).

undefined.name: Ice-Breaking Light
undefined.desc: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to {1} of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to {2} of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
